Comments_List: how to work with music programs and compose with computers

The weekly lessons are very helpful. The portfolio exercises were interesting, but I felt they could have been better planned - in particular, it was odd how long the percussion assignments stretched out, especially in the distance between the workshop and the readings.
Yes, this course gives credit for writing music that if you're a composer, you would probably write anyways.
